articles.title: Pakistan detects first Omicron case -health ministry official - Reuters
articles.description: Authorities in Pakistan have detected the first case of the Omicron variant of coronavirus in the South Asian nation, a provincial health ministry official told Reuters on Thursday.
articles.content: KARACHI, Dec 9 (Reuters) - Authorities in Pakistan have detected the first case of the Omicron variant of coronavirus in the South Asian nation, a provincial health ministry official told Reuters on … [+534 chars]

articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed as investors assess omicron risks - CNBC
articles.description: The World Health Organization on Wednesday said the new Covid variant could change the course of the pandemic.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed Thursday as investors assessed risks surrounding the omicron Covid variant.
The Nikkei 225 in Japan declined 0.15% while the Topix index fell 0.29%.

articles.title: Singapore boasts 6 spots on World's 50 Best Bars 2021 list - CNA
articles.description: London's Connaught Bar is the world's best, while Jigger & Pony is Singapore's only entry in the Top 10 at No 9. Atlas lost its The Best Bar in Asia title, which it had held for two years.
articles.content:
Nightlife in Singapore may have quieted down during the pandemic but that hasnt stopped some of our local drinking establishments from topping the Worlds 50 Best Bars 2021 list.
